places.name: Great Wall of China
places.description: The Great Wall of China is a series of fortifications and walls built across the historical northern borders of ancient Chinese states and Imperial China to protect against nomadic invasions.

places.name: Forbidden City
places.description: The Forbidden City is the former Chinese imperial palace from the Ming dynasty to the end of the Qing dynasty. It now houses the Palace Museum.
places.address: 4 Jingshan Front St, Dongcheng District, Beijing

places.name: Temple of Heaven
places.description: The Temple of Heaven is an imperial complex of religious buildings situated in the southeastern part of central Beijing. It was visited by the Emperors of the Ming and Qing dynasties for annual ceremonies of prayer to Heaven for good harvest.
places.address: 1 Tiantan E Rd, Dongcheng District, Beijing

places.name: The Bund
places.description: The Bund is a waterfront area in central Shanghai, featuring iconic buildings and a stunning view of the Pudong skyline.
places.address: Zhongshan East 1st Rd, Huangpu District, Shanghai

places.name: Yu Garden
places.description: Yu Garden is an extensive Chinese garden located beside the City God Temple in the northeast of the Old City of Shanghai.

places.name: Shanghai Tower
places.description: Shanghai Tower is a 632-meter (2,073 ft), 128-story megatall skyscraper in Lujiazui, Pudong, Shanghai. It is the world's second-tallest building by height to architectural top.
places.address: 501 Yincheng Middle Rd, Lujiazui, Pudong, Shanghai

places.name: Terracotta Army
places.description: The Terracotta Army is a collection of terracotta sculptures depicting the armies of Qin Shi Huang, the first Emperor of China. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

places.name: Xi'an City Wall
places.description: The Xi'an City Wall is one of the oldest, largest and best preserved city walls in China. Visitors can walk, cycle or take a buggy ride on top of the wall.
places.address: 2 Shuncheng E Alley, Beilin District, Xi'an

places.name: Giant Wild Goose Pagoda
places.description: The Giant Wild Goose Pagoda is a Buddhist pagoda built in 652 during the Tang dynasty. It is a well-preserved holy place for Buddhists.
places.address: Yanta S Rd, Yanta District, Xi'an

places.name: Shenyang Imperial Palace
places.description: The Shenyang Imperial Palace, also known as Mukden Palace, was the former imperial palace of the early Qing dynasty. It is a UNESCO World Heritage Site.

places.name: Beiling Park
places.description: Beiling Park is a public park and historic site in Shenyang, centered on the tomb of Huang Taiji, the second emperor of the Qing dynasty.

places.name: Shenyang Botanical Garden
places.description: Shenyang Botanical Garden is a large botanical garden featuring a wide variety of plants and beautiful landscapes.
places.address: 1 Botanical Garden Rd, Shenhe District, Shenyang

places.name: Window of the World
places.description: Window of the World is a theme park featuring miniature replicas of famous landmarks from around the globe.

places.name: Splendid China Folk Village
places.description: Splendid China Folk Village is a theme park showcasing China's history, culture, and ethnic diversity through miniature replicas and performances.
places.address: Overseas Chinese Town, Nanshan District, Shenzhen

places.name: Shenzhen Museum
places.description: Shenzhen Museum showcases the city's history, culture, and rapid development through various exhibits and artifacts.

places.name: Canton Tower
places.description: Canton Tower is a 604-meter tall multi-purpose observation tower offering panoramic views of Guangzhou.
places.address: 222 Yuejiang W Rd, Haizhu District, Guangzhou

places.name: Chen Clan Ancestral Hall
places.description: Chen Clan Ancestral Hall is a historic building complex featuring traditional Guangdong architecture and craftsmanship.

places.name: Shamian Island
places.description: Shamian Island is a sandbank island in the Liwan District of Guangzhou with a rich history and European-style architecture.

places.name: Giant Panda Breeding Research Base
places.description: The Chengdu Research Base of Giant Panda Breeding is a non-profit research and breeding facility for giant pandas and other rare animals.

places.name: Jinli Ancient Street
places.description: Jinli Ancient Street is a famous pedestrian street showcasing the culture of Sichuan, featuring traditional architecture, food, and crafts.

places.name: Leshan Giant Buddha
places.description: The Leshan Giant Buddha is a 71-meter tall stone statue built during the Tang Dynasty, depicting Maitreya Buddha.

places.name: Tianjin Eye
places.description: The Tianjin Eye is a 120-meter tall giant Ferris wheel built over the Yongle Bridge, offering panoramic views of the city.

places.name: Porcelain House
places.description: The Porcelain House is a contemporary museum and work of art covered in ancient porcelain, crystal, and antique china.

places.name: Five Great Avenues
places.description: The Five Great Avenues area features over 230 buildings with various architectural styles from the 1920s and 1930s.

places.name: Yellow Crane Tower
places.description: Yellow Crane Tower is a famous landmark of Wuhan with a history of over 1,800 years, offering panoramic views of the Yangtze River.

places.name: East Lake
places.description: East Lake is the largest urban lake in China, featuring beautiful landscapes, gardens, and recreational areas.

places.name: Hubei Provincial Museum
places.description: Hubei Provincial Museum houses significant historical and cultural artifacts, including the renowned Marquis Yi of Zeng's chime bells.

places.name: West Lake
places.description: West Lake is a freshwater lake in Hangzhou, known for its scenic beauty and historical and cultural sites.

places.name: Lingyin Temple
places.description: Lingyin Temple is one of the largest and most visited Buddhist temples in China, known for its rich history and beautiful architecture.

places.name: Xixi National Wetland Park
places.description: Xixi National Wetland Park is the first and only national wetland park in China, combining urban life, farming, and wetland cultures.

places.name: Opium War Museum
places.description: The Opium War Museum is dedicated to the history of the Opium Wars and their impact on Chinese society.

places.name: Keyuan Garden
places.description: Keyuan Garden is a classical Lingnan-style garden built in the Qing Dynasty, known for its exquisite architecture and landscaping.

places.name: Huangqi Mountain Park
places.description: Huangqi Mountain Park offers beautiful natural scenery, hiking trails, and panoramic views of Dongguan city.

places.name: Ciqikou Ancient Town
places.description: Ciqikou Ancient Town is a well-preserved town with a history of over 1,700 years, known for its traditional architecture and local culture.

places.name: Hongya Cave
places.description: Hongya Cave is a multi-story stilt house complex built into a cliff face, featuring shops, restaurants, and stunning night views.

places.name: Dazu Rock Carvings
places.description: The Dazu Rock Carvings are a series of Chinese religious sculptures and carvings, dating back to the 7th century AD.

places.name: Ancestral Temple of the Chen Family
places.description: The Ancestral Temple of the Chen Family is a well-preserved example of Qing Dynasty architecture and a center for traditional Cantonese folk art.
places.address: Chen Clan Academy, Zhongshan 7th Rd, Liwan District, Guangzhou

places.name: Foshan Ancestral Temple
places.description: Foshan Ancestral Temple is a historic temple complex dedicated to the Chinese god Beidi, featuring intricate architecture and cultural performances.

places.name: Qinghui Garden
places.description: Qinghui Garden is a classical Lingnan-style garden known for its exquisite landscaping, architecture, and cultural significance.
places.address: 1 Fenjiang N Rd, Chancheng District, Foshan

places.name: Humble Administrator's Garden
places.description: The Humble Administrator's Garden is the largest and most renowned classical garden in Suzhou, known for its exquisite design and natural beauty.

places.name: Tiger Hill
places.description: Tiger Hill is a popular tourist destination featuring the leaning Cloud Rock Pagoda, beautiful gardens, and historical sites.

places.name: Suzhou Museum
places.description: Suzhou Museum, designed by I.M. Pei, houses a collection of ancient Chinese art, including paintings, calligraphy, and handmade crafts.

places.name: Daming Lake
places.description: Daming Lake is a famous scenic spot in Jinan, known for its natural springs, beautiful landscapes, and historical pavilions.
places.address: Daming Lake Scenic Area, Lixia District, Jinan

places.name: Thousand Buddha Mountain
places.description: Thousand Buddha Mountain is a famous mountain park featuring ancient Buddhist rock carvings, temples, and panoramic views of Jinan.
places.address: Thousand Buddha Mountain, Lixia District, Jinan

places.name: Baotu Spring Park
places.description: Baotu Spring Park is home to the famous Baotu Spring, known as the 'First Spring under Heaven', and features beautiful gardens and historic buildings.
places.address: 1 Baotuquan S Rd, Lixia District, Jinan

places.name: Zhanqiao Pier
places.description: Zhanqiao Pier is an iconic landmark of Qingdao, offering beautiful views of the sea and the city's skyline.

places.name: Laoshan Scenic Area
places.description: Laoshan Scenic Area is a famous mountain area known for its breathtaking landscapes, Taoist temples, and tea plantations.

places.name: Qingdao Beer Museum
places.description: The Qingdao Beer Museum showcases the history of Tsingtao Brewery and offers beer tasting experiences.

places.name: Zhaozhou Bridge
places.description: Zhaozhou Bridge is the oldest standing stone arch bridge in China, known for its unique design and historical significance.

places.name: Cangyan Mountain Scenic Area
places.description: Cangyan Mountain Scenic Area features ancient temples, stunning natural landscapes, and was a filming location for 'Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon'.

places.name: Xibaipo Memorial
places.description: Xibaipo Memorial is a historical site commemorating the Communist Party of China's leadership in the late 1940s before the founding of the People's Republic of China.

places.name: Xinghai Square
places.description: Xinghai Square is one of the largest city squares in the world, featuring a music fountain, sculptures, and beautiful coastal views.

places.name: Sunasia Ocean World
places.description: Sunasia Ocean World is a large aquarium featuring a wide variety of marine life, shows, and interactive experiences.

places.name: Jinshitan Scenic Area
places.description: Jinshitan Scenic Area, also known as Golden Pebble Beach, features a beautiful coastline, unique rock formations, and various recreational activities.

places.name: Gulangyu Island
places.description: Gulangyu Island is a pedestrian-only island off the coast of Xiamen, known for its beautiful beaches, Victorian-era architecture, and piano museum.

places.name: South Putuo Temple
places.description: South Putuo Temple is a famous Buddhist temple with a history of over 1,000 years, featuring beautiful architecture and ocean views.
places.address: 515 Siming S Rd, Siming District, Xiamen

places.name: Xiamen University
places.description: Xiamen University is one of China's most beautiful campuses, known for its picturesque landscapes and traditional Chinese architecture.
places.address: 422 Siming S Rd, Siming District, Xiamen

places.name: Qingxiu Mountain
places.description: Qingxiu Mountain is a scenic area featuring lush forests, Buddhist temples, and beautiful landscapes.

places.name: Nanning Zoo
places.description: Nanning Zoo is one of the largest zoos in China, home to a wide variety of animals including pandas, elephants, and tigers.

places.name: Guangxi Museum of Nationalities
places.description: The Guangxi Museum of Nationalities showcases the culture and history of Guangxi's ethnic minorities through exhibits and artifacts.

places.name: Puppet Emperor's Palace
places.description: The Puppet Emperor's Palace, also known as the Museum of the Imperial Palace of Manchukuo, showcases the history of Japanese occupation in Northeast China.
places.address: 5 Guangfu N Rd, Kuancheng District, Changchun

places.name: Changchun World Sculpture Park
places.description: Changchun World Sculpture Park is a large outdoor museum featuring over 400 sculptures from artists around the world.

places.name: Jingyuetan National Forest Park
places.description: Jingyuetan National Forest Park is a large natural park featuring a lake, forests, and recreational facilities for various outdoor activities.

places.name: Jinci Temple
places.description: Jinci Temple is an ancient temple complex known for its beautiful gardens, historic architecture, and the famous Zhou Cypress, believed to be over 3,000 years old.

places.name: Shanxi Museum
places.description: Shanxi Museum is a large museum showcasing the rich history and culture of Shanxi Province, featuring ancient artifacts, paintings, and calligraphy.
places.address: 13 Binhe W Rd, Xiaodian District, Taiyuan

places.name: Tianlong Mountain
places.description: Tianlong Mountain is known for its ancient Buddhist grottoes, featuring intricate carvings and statues dating back to the Tang Dynasty.

places.name: Heavenly Lake
places.description: Heavenly Lake is a beautiful alpine lake surrounded by snow-capped mountains, offering stunning scenery and boat rides.

places.name: Xinjiang Regional Museum
places.description: The Xinjiang Regional Museum showcases the history, culture, and ethnic diversity of the Xinjiang region through artifacts and exhibits.

places.name: Red Hill Park
places.description: Red Hill Park is a popular urban park featuring the iconic Red Hill, pagodas, and panoramic views of Urumqi city.

places.name: Sun Yat-sen's Residence Memorial Museum
places.description: This museum is dedicated to Dr. Sun Yat-sen, the founding father of modern China, showcasing his life and revolutionary activities.

places.name: Zimaling Park
places.description: Zimaling Park is a large urban park featuring beautiful landscapes, lakes, and recreational facilities.

places.name: Sunwen West Road Pedestrian Street
places.description: This bustling pedestrian street is known for its unique architecture, shopping, and local cuisine.

places.name: Lord Bao Park
places.description: Lord Bao Park is dedicated to Bao Zheng, a famous official known for his honesty and justice, featuring temples and beautiful gardens.

places.name: Xiaoyaojin Park
places.description: Xiaoyaojin Park is a large urban park featuring lakes, gardens, and historical sites, popular for leisure activities.

places.name: Anhui Museum
places.description: Anhui Museum showcases the rich history and culture of Anhui Province through a vast collection of artifacts and exhibits.

places.name: Tianyi Pavilion
places.description: Tianyi Pavilion is China's oldest existing library, featuring a vast collection of ancient books and beautiful traditional architecture.

places.name: Dongqian Lake
places.description: Dongqian Lake is the largest freshwater lake in Zhejiang, offering beautiful scenery, water activities, and surrounding attractions.

places.name: Ningbo Museum
places.description: Ningbo Museum, designed by Wang Shu, showcases the history and culture of Ningbo through its unique architecture and exhibits.
places.address: 1000 Shounan Middle Road, Yinzhou District, Ningbo

places.name: Three Lanes and Seven Alleys
places.description: Three Lanes and Seven Alleys is a historic district featuring well-preserved Ming and Qing dynasty architecture and traditional Fuzhou culture.

places.name: West Lake Park
places.description: West Lake Park is a scenic park featuring a lake, gardens, and historic sites, popular for leisure activities and cultural events.
places.address: West Lake Road, Gulou District, Fuzhou

places.name: Fuzhou National Forest Park
places.description: Fuzhou National Forest Park is a large nature reserve offering hiking trails, scenic views, and diverse flora and fauna.

places.name: Tengwang Pavilion
places.description: Tengwang Pavilion is one of the Four Great Towers of China, known for its impressive architecture and cultural significance.

places.name: Bayi Square
places.description: Bayi Square is the largest city square in China, featuring the August 1 Nanchang Uprising Monument and various cultural facilities.

places.name: Jiangxi Museum
places.description: Jiangxi Museum showcases the rich history and culture of Jiangxi Province through a vast collection of artifacts and exhibits.

places.name: Zhongshan Bridge
places.description: Zhongshan Bridge is the first bridge over the Yellow River and a symbol of Lanzhou, offering scenic views and historical significance.

places.name: White Pagoda Mountain Park
places.description: White Pagoda Mountain Park features a prominent white pagoda, offering panoramic views of Lanzhou and the Yellow River.

places.name: Gansu Provincial Museum
places.description: Gansu Provincial Museum showcases the rich history and culture of Gansu Province, including the famous 'Flying Horse of Gansu' bronze sculpture.
places.address: 3 Xijin East Road, Chengguan District, Lanzhou

places.name: Langshan
places.description: Langshan is a scenic mountain area featuring Buddhist temples, hiking trails, and panoramic views of Nantong and the Yangtze River.
places.address: Langshan Scenic Area, Chongchuan District, Nantong

places.name: Nantong Museum
places.description: Nantong Museum, founded in 1905, is one of the oldest museums in China, showcasing local history, culture, and art.

places.name: Haohe Scenic Area
places.description: Haohe Scenic Area is a historic district along the Haohe River, featuring traditional architecture, bridges, and cultural attractions.

places.name: Han Dynasty Terracotta Warriors
places.description: This site features terracotta warriors from the Han Dynasty, offering a unique glimpse into ancient Chinese history and art.

places.name: Yunlong Mountain Scenic Area
places.description: Yunlong Mountain offers beautiful landscapes, hiking trails, and panoramic views of Xuzhou city.

places.name: Xuzhou Museum
places.description: Xuzhou Museum showcases the rich history and culture of Xuzhou, featuring artifacts from various dynasties.

places.name: Yandang Mountain
places.description: Yandang Mountain is a UNESCO Global Geopark known for its stunning rock formations, waterfalls, and scenic hiking trails.

places.name: Jiangxin Island
places.description: Jiangxin Island is a scenic spot in the middle of the Oujiang River, featuring historic buildings and beautiful gardens.

places.name: Nanxi River
places.description: Nanxi River is known for its clear waters, unique rock formations, and traditional fishing villages along its banks.

places.name: Mengshan Giant Buddha
places.description: The Mengshan Giant Buddha is one of the largest cliff-carved stone Buddhas in China, surrounded by beautiful mountain scenery.
places.address: Mengshan Scenic Area, Yinan County, Linyi

places.name: Linyi Underground Great Wall
places.description: The Linyi Underground Great Wall is a vast network of tunnels used for defense during wartime, offering a unique historical experience.

places.name: Yimeng Revolutionary Memorial Hall
places.description: This memorial hall commemorates the revolutionary history of the Yimeng area during the Chinese Revolution.

places.name: Lingshan Grand Buddha
places.description: The Lingshan Grand Buddha is one of the largest Buddha statues in China, surrounded by beautiful gardens and cultural exhibits.

places.name: Taihu Lake
places.description: Taihu Lake is one of the largest freshwater lakes in China, offering scenic boat tours and beautiful lakeside parks.

places.name: Nanchan Temple
places.description: Nanchan Temple is one of the oldest wooden structures in southern China, known for its intricate architecture and historical significance.
places.address: 1 Nanchan Temple Street, Binhu District, Wuxi

places.name: Tangshan Earthquake Memorial Park
places.description: This memorial park commemorates the devastating 1976 Tangshan earthquake and serves as a reminder of the city's resilience.

places.name: Kailuan National Mine Park
places.description: This park offers a unique look into China's industrial heritage, featuring a century-old coal mine and mining equipment.

places.name: Tangshan South Lake Ecological Park
places.description: This large urban park features a beautiful lake, gardens, and recreational facilities, perfect for relaxation and outdoor activities.

places.name: Dazhao Temple
places.description: Dazhao Temple is the oldest and largest Tibetan Buddhist monastery in Inner Mongolia, known for its silver Buddha statue.

places.name: Inner Mongolia Museum
places.description: This museum showcases the history, culture, and natural heritage of Inner Mongolia through extensive exhibits and artifacts.
places.address: 27 Xinhua East Street, Xincheng District, Hohhot

places.name: Xilamuren Grassland
places.description: Xilamuren Grassland offers visitors a chance to experience traditional Mongolian culture and enjoy the vast grassland landscape.

places.name: Haikou Volcanic Cluster Global Geopark
places.chineseName: 海口火山群世界地质公园
places.description: This geopark features a unique volcanic landscape with craters, lava tunnels, and tropical vegetation.

places.name: Haikou Millennium Old Town
places.description: This historic district showcases traditional architecture and local culture, with many shops and restaurants.

places.name: Holiday Beach
places.description: Holiday Beach is a popular coastal area offering water activities, beach sports, and beautiful sunset views.

places.name: Lu Xun Native Place
places.description: This memorial complex is dedicated to Lu Xun, one of China's most famous writers, featuring his former residence and related exhibits.
places.address: 208 Lu Xun Middle Road, Yuecheng District, Shaoxing

places.name: East Lake
places.description: East Lake is a scenic area known for its beautiful water landscape, traditional architecture, and cultural significance.

places.name: Shaoxing Ancient Town
places.description: This well-preserved water town features traditional architecture, stone bridges, and canals, offering a glimpse into ancient Chinese life.

places.name: Penglai Pavilion
places.description: Penglai Pavilion is a famous Taoist site known for its beautiful architecture and legends of immortals and mirages.

places.name: Yantai Mountain
places.description: Yantai Mountain offers panoramic views of the city and sea, featuring historic buildings and a lighthouse.

places.name: Changyu Wine Culture Museum
places.description: This museum showcases the history of China's oldest and largest winery, offering wine tasting experiences.

places.name: Longmen Grottoes
places.description: The Longmen Grottoes are a UNESCO World Heritage site featuring thousands of Buddhist rock carvings dating back to the 5th century.

places.name: White Horse Temple
places.description: White Horse Temple is considered the first Buddhist temple in China, with a history dating back to the 1st century AD.

places.name: Luoyang Ancient Tomb Museum
places.description: This museum showcases ancient tombs and burial artifacts from various dynasties, offering insights into Chinese burial customs.
places.address: 35 Mingshu South Road, Xigong District, Luoyang

places.name: Shaolin Temple
places.description: Shaolin Temple is renowned as the birthplace of Zen Buddhism and Chinese martial arts, featuring ancient architecture and kung fu performances.

places.name: Henan Museum
places.description: Henan Museum is one of China's oldest and largest museums, showcasing the rich history and culture of Henan Province through numerous artifacts.

places.name: Yellow River Scenic Area
places.description: The Yellow River Scenic Area offers stunning views of China's Mother River, featuring the Camel Mountain and the Five Dragons Peak.

places.name: Orange Island
places.description: Orange Island is a scenic sandbar in the Xiangjiang River, known for its orange groves and a giant statue of young Mao Zedong.

places.name: Yuelu Mountain
places.description: Yuelu Mountain is a famous scenic area offering beautiful views, historic sites, and the ancient Yuelu Academy.

places.name: Hunan Provincial Museum
places.description: Hunan Provincial Museum houses important artifacts including the well-preserved Mawangdui Han tombs and their contents.

places.name: Erhai Lake
places.description: Erhai Lake is a beautiful alpine lake offering scenic views, boat rides, and surrounding traditional villages.

places.name: Three Pagodas
places.description: The Three Pagodas are an iconic symbol of Dali, dating back to the 9th century and offering beautiful architectural designs.

places.name: Dali Ancient City
places.description: Dali Ancient City is a well-preserved town featuring traditional Bai architecture, shops, and cultural experiences.

places.name: Qianling Park
places.description: Qianling Park is a large urban park featuring beautiful landscapes, temples, and a population of wild macaques.

places.name: Jiaxiu Tower
places.description: Jiaxiu Tower is a historic landmark overlooking the Nanming River, known for its traditional architecture and cultural significance.

places.name: Guiyang Confucius Temple
places.description: This well-preserved Confucian temple complex showcases traditional Chinese architecture and Confucian culture.

places.name: Saint Sophia Cathedral
places.description: Saint Sophia Cathedral is a former Russian Orthodox church turned museum, known for its beautiful Byzantine architecture.

places.name: Harbin Ice and Snow World
places.description: This famous winter attraction features massive ice sculptures, ice slides, and other winter activities.

places.name: Siberian Tiger Park
places.description: Siberian Tiger Park is a large nature reserve dedicated to the conservation of Siberian tigers and other big cats.

places.name: Stone Forest
places.description: The Stone Forest is a notable set of limestone formations, creating a stunning landscape of rock pillars and intricate shapes.

places.name: Dianchi Lake
places.description: Dianchi Lake is the largest freshwater lake in Yunnan, offering scenic views, boat rides, and surrounding attractions.

places.name: Yunnan Ethnic Village
places.description: Yunnan Ethnic Village is a theme park showcasing the cultures and traditions of Yunnan's diverse ethnic minorities.

places.name: Old Town of Lijiang
places.description: The Old Town of Lijiang is a UNESCO World Heritage site known for its traditional architecture, canals, and Naxi culture.

places.name: Jade Dragon Snow Mountain
places.description: Jade Dragon Snow Mountain is a picturesque mountain range offering stunning views, hiking trails, and a cable car to the summit.

places.name: Black Dragon Pool
places.description: Black Dragon Pool is a scenic park featuring a lake, traditional bridges, and stunning views of Jade Dragon Snow Mountain.

places.name: Purple Mountain
places.description: Purple Mountain is a scenic area featuring numerous historical and cultural sites, including the Sun Yat-sen Mausoleum.

places.name: Nanjing Confucius Temple
places.description: This historic complex features a Confucian temple, imperial examination hall, and a bustling shopping area along the Qinhuai River.

places.name: Nanjing City Wall
places.description: The ancient city wall of Nanjing is one of the longest and best-preserved city walls in China, offering a glimpse into the city's history.
